title: Adopt Angelina a Ragdo...
content: Half Ragdoll Angelinaâ€™s mom was a Bloodline rag doll. We do not know dad but she has the softest fluffy fur like her mom. She has a touch of peach pointing on her that is subtle. They both are snugglers and just so pretty. Angelina wants to go home with her brother Antonio. The adoption payment is 200. Each but these guys are worth it!  Note: if you do not have any other pets, we require that you adopt 2 kittens. This is for the benefit of the kitten for behavioral development. Companionship is critical. They will also entertain each other and you!  We offer a low cost spay and neuter package. This cat has tested FeLV/FIV. negative, is current on vaccinations, parasite-free and litter-box trained. To hasten the adoption process, please complete our adoption application on-line athttp://form.jotform.us/form/51856066903157 . You can meet many of our pets at these locations:  Pet Valu in Wayne PA 317 Lancaster Avenue Pet Valu in Ardmore PA at 217 West Lancaster Avenue Pet Valu in Newtown Square at 3741 West Chester Pike For information call or text Pat Maloney at 610-299-XXXX, email us at XXXX@gmail.com or complete our adoption application athttp://www.adoptapet.com/palsIf you would like to volunteer or foster, please complete our volunteer or foster forms athttp://www.adoptapet.com/palsThank you!

title: Ragdoll Kits Many colo...
content: These cute babies are ready to go to their new homes They all have crystal-blue eyes and sweet personalities. Ragdolls are best known for their docile and placid temperament and affectionate nature. They love to be held and are played with regularly by kids and adults. They are eating solid food and are very nice with their kit-sized litter boxes. We use World s Best Cat Litter (organic corn product) and a mixture of Iams and Friskies foods. firm for kits sold as pets for kits sold with breeding rights Documents will be ordered for the kits sold as breeders and will arrive from The International Cattery Association in Harlingen Texas within - weeks.
